title: Cue AI - Your Personal AI Assistant
description:
Cue AI is your intelligent personal assistant for building better habits, without the overwhelm.

🔄 Automatically generates custom routines based on your lifestyle and goals
⏰ Context-aware reminders trigger at the right time, when you’re most likely to act
✨ Clean, intuitive interface that makes staying on track feel effortless

Whether you’re trying to build a morning routine, stay hydrated, or finally get consistent with your focus sessions, Cue adapts to you, not the other way around.
